mapper.select: SELECT a.ORG_REL_ID AS orgRelId, a.CUST_ID AS custId, a.LAW_ORG_ID AS lawOrgId, a.ECIF_CUST_ID AS ecifCustId, a.CUST_NAME AS custName, a.BELONG_ORG_ID AS belongOrgId, a.BELONG_ORG_NAME AS belongOrgName, a.MAIN_ORG_TYPE AS mainOrgType, a.ASSIGN_TYPE AS assignType, a.ASSIGN_USER_ID AS assignUserId, a.ASSIGN_DATE AS assignDate FROM T_PCM_ORG_REL AS a
